withdrawal.title: Withdrawal
withdrawal.notice1: Withdrawal bank name must match to registered full name. Member unable to withdrawal to 3rd party bank account.
withdrawal.notice2: Please make sure already achieve the 1x turnover of deposit amount before submit the withdrawal transaction.
withdrawal.notice3: Please make sure the bank account name & bank account number is correct before submitted the withdrawal transaction.

about.title: About AONE
about.tagline: play your way, earn your pay
about.paragraph1: Aone Global Gaming is a premier online gaming platform that offers a wide range of games, including casino games, sports betting, p2p, fishing and live games. Our platform is designed to provide a seamless and immersive gaming experience for players of all levels.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to provide our customers with the best possible gaming experience, with a focus on security, transparency, and fairness. We believe that trust is the foundation of any successful gaming platform, and we are committed to maintaining the highest levels of security and fairness in all of our games.
about.paragraph3: At Aone Global Gaming, we are passionate about providing our customers with a wide range of games and betting options, from classic casino games to the latest live games and sports betting options. Our platform is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy for players to find their favorite games and place bets with ease.
about.paragraph4: We are dedicated to providing our customers with exceptional customer service, and our team is available 24/7 to assist with any questions or concerns. We believe that our success is based on the satisfaction of our customers, and we are committed to delivering the highest level of service to ensure that our customers are always satisfied.
about.paragraph5: Thank you for choosing Aone Global Gaming, and we look forward to providing you with the best possible gaming experience.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to AONE Global Gaming. These terms and conditions ("Terms") apply to your use of our website and any associated services. By using our website, you agree to these Terms, which form a legal agreement between you and us. Please read them carefully before using our website.
terms.eligibilityContent:
You must be at least 18 years of age or the legal age for gambling in your jurisdiction, whichever is greater, to use our services. By accessing or using our website, you represent and warrant that you meet these age requirements.

You must not be a resident of any jurisdiction where online gambling is prohibited. It is your responsibility to ensure that your use of our services complies with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction.

We reserve the right to request proof of age and identity at any time. Failure to provide satisfactory proof may result in the suspension or termination of your account.
terms.userAccountsContent:
To use certain features of our website, you may be required to register an account. You must provide accurate and complete information when registering an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your username and password. You must not share your account information with anyone else. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

You may only maintain one account with us. If we discover that you have multiple accounts, we reserve the right to close all accounts and forfeit any funds held in those accounts.

You are responsible for keeping your contact information up to date. We will not be liable for any communications sent to an outdated email address or phone number.
terms.depositsWithdrawalsContent:
All deposits must be made using payment methods that are registered in your name. We do not accept third-party payments.

Minimum and maximum deposit and withdrawal limits apply and may vary depending on your account status and payment method. These limits are displayed on the relevant pages of our website.

Withdrawal requests are subject to verification procedures to ensure the security of your account. We reserve the right to request additional documentation before processing any withdrawal.

Processing times for withdrawals vary depending on the payment method selected. We aim to process all withdrawals within 24-48 hours, but this may take longer during peak periods or if additional verification is required.
terms.wageringContent:
All bets placed on our platform are subject to these Terms and Conditions, as well as the specific rules for each game or betting market.

We reserve the right to void any bets that we reasonably believe were placed in error, or that were the result of technical malfunctions, fraud, or manipulation.

Maximum bet limits apply to all games and betting markets. These limits may vary based on your account status and the specific game or market.

Once a bet is confirmed, it cannot be cancelled or changed. Please ensure that you review all bet details carefully before confirming.
terms.bonusesRewardsContent:
All bonuses and promotions are subject to specific terms and conditions, which will be clearly stated at the time of the offer.

Wagering requirements must be met before any bonus funds or winnings derived from bonus funds can be withdrawn. The specific wagering requirements will be stated in the bonus terms.

We reserve the right to exclude any customer from participating in any bonus or promotion at our discretion.

Abuse of bonuses, including but not limited to creating multiple accounts to claim bonuses, may result in the forfeiture of bonus funds and winnings, and the suspension or termination of your account.
terms.prohibitedConductContent:
You must not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not violate any laws in your jurisdiction when using our services.

You must not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or interfere with the proper functioning of our website.

You must not use any automated systems, software, or tools to access our website or place bets, unless expressly authorized by us.

Collusion, fraud, or any form of cheating is strictly prohibited and will result in the immediate termination of your account and forfeiture of any funds.

We reserve the right to report any suspicious activity to the relevant authorities.
